name: Spine Stabber
summary: The quills on your arms are particularly sharp and sturdy.
description:
The quills on your arms are particularly sharp and sturdy. You gain a quills unarmed attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage. Your quills are in the knife weapon group and have the finesse and unarmed traits.Spine Stabber Leads To...

Piercing QuillsTraitsShisk: Secretive humanoids covered in bony plumage that reside underground.
